body: #ResizeFileImage.js Resize images with JavaScript. ##Parameters ResizeFileImage ( source, callback, width, height, format ); ##Sources Resize images from diferents sources. ###input tag ###img tag ###JQuery Selector * if selector return more than one, only resized the first element. ###String ##Format Default format image/png ###Options * 'image/png' * 'image/jpg' ##Basic usage source from input tag and de image resized loaded in img tag.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Resizefileimage.js
